summary: A comprehensive test suite for Django admin inline functionality, including custom admin configurations, form classes, lightweight test models, template utilities for JavaScript escaping, and Selenium-driven UI interaction tests covering stacked and tabular inlines, media handling, permissions, and protectedâ€‘delete behavior.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness and robustness of Django admin inline features and related customizations, ensuring reliable form validation, media rendering, permission enforcement, and user interface behavior in production environments.
